e13061c5926bb3b384bd5079111e858e (17:53): the id and name of an elemnt doesnt have to be the same right? and there can always be only one element with a uniqe ID, but more than one elements can have the same name?
c273fcbab365f0fc18405a93ef28346a (17:54): kon: yes, yes, yes.
189edbf28f3da1f5bf29efe53c42687b (17:55): Setien: node.parentNode.replaceChild(node.cloneNode(false), node);
28d5723900b802fcd84e672f74b909b1 (17:55): Raevel, ok, I feared that.
28d5723900b802fcd84e672f74b909b1 (17:56): I was really hoping there was some awfully obvious way that I had missed.
28d5723900b802fcd84e672f74b909b1 (17:56): Thanks for your suggestions.
189edbf28f3da1f5bf29efe53c42687b (17:56): innerHTML is probably a lot faster
4e96fd19b7450b0fe822449638fe1499 (17:56): Yes, but innerHTML is bad and naughty. :)
189edbf28f3da1f5bf29efe53c42687b (17:56): in this case, i wouldnt say so
189edbf28f3da1f5bf29efe53c42687b (17:57): i think it's pretty much impossible to break anything by doing it
